item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 2:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (632 points | 270 comments)
2. Italian Music Through the Lens of Complex Networks (34 points | 4 comments)
3. AWS Nitro Enclaves: Attack Surface (14 points | discuss)
4. Octopuses seen hunting together with fish, punching those that don't cooperate (115 points | 57 comments)
5. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (1049 points | 821 comments)
6. Supacat MUV: Affordable military vehicle based on Toyota Hilux pick-up truck (17 points | 3 comments)
7. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (733 points | 234 comments)
8. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (317 points | 156 comments)
9. OpenAI to Become For-Profit Company (369 points | 191 comments)
10. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (103 points | 19 comments)
11. Poka Labs (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
12. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (94 points | 42 comments)
13. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (287 points | 149 comments)
14. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (252 points | 115 comments)
15. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (47 points | 19 comments)
16. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (279 points | 88 comments)
17. Writing Portable Rendering Code with Nvrhi (15 points | 1 comment)
18. Another new wasp species discovered by researchers (9 points | 5 comments)
19. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (49 points | 13 comments)
20. Register Allocation in the Go Compiler (44 points | 3 comments)
21. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (204 points | 227 comments)
22. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (163 points | 46 comments)
23. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (33 points | 5 comments)
24. PostgreSQL 17 Released (31 points | 1 comment)
25. Why I still blog after 15 years (419 points | 210 comments)
26. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (156 points | 114 comments)
27. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (311 points | 103 comments)
28. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (112 points | 49 comments)
29. Vehicles Could Be Hacked and Tracked Thanks to a Simple Website Bug (10 points | 3 comments)
30. Audio Masking (128 points | 18 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 2:20 PM UTC
